clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of PEEP on Intracranial and Intraocular Pressure in Robot-assisted Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Positive End Expiratory Pressure (PEEP) on Intracranial and Intraocular Pressure in Robot-assisted Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy

brief_summary.textblock: To investigate the effects of positive end-expiratory pressure (PEEP) on the intracerebral pressure (ICP) and intraocular pressure (IOP) in patients undergoing robot assisted laparoscopic radical prostatectomy (RALRP)

detailed_description.textblock: Application of PEEPmay reduce pulmonary complication following RALRP. Meanwhile, it may increase ICP and IOP, which has been debated for decades. Moreover, Trendelenburg position and pneumoperitoneum, which are mandatory for RALRP, may augment elevation of ICP and IOP. This study aims to investigate the effects of PEEP on the ICP and IOP in patients undergoing RALRP.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Changes from pre-induction (baseline) at Post-induction 5 min, Pneumoperitoneum insufflation and Trendelenburg position 5 min, Pneumoperitoneum insufflation and Trendelenburg position 30 min, Penumoperitoneum desufflation and supine position 5 min
primary_outcome.description: IOP is directly assessed by measurement of IOP with the Tono-Pen AVIAÂ®

primary_outcome.time_frame: Changes from pre-induction (baseline) at Post-induction 5 min, Pneumoperitoneum insufflation and Trendelenburg position 5 min, Pneumoperitoneum insufflation and Trendelenburg position 30 min, Penumoperitoneum desufflation and supine position 5 min
primary_outcome.description: ICP is indirectly assessed by measurement of optic nerve sheath diameter(ONSD) with the ultrasound

arm_group.description: Application of 5 cmH2O PEEP during mechanical ventilation
No application of PEEP during mechanical ventilation

intervention.description: Application of 5cmH20 positive end expiratory pressure
No application of positive end expiratory pressure

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients undergoing robotic-assisted laparoscopic radical prostatectomy
Exclusion Criteria:
- History of opthalmic disease or surgery
- History of brain disease or surgery
- Known ICP elevation
- Known IOP elevation
- Presence of lung bullae on chest x-ray
- History of pneumothorax

facility.name: Yonsei University Medical College Gangnam Severance Hospital
